description: This file defines a mock class ServiceMock for the WPEFramework plugin shell interface, using Google Mock for unit testing. It declares mock methods corresponding to the virtual methods in the IShell interface, including service identification, path retrieval, state management, and control functions.

classes.name: ServiceMock
classes.description: A mock implementation of the WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell interface, used for unit testing the plugin shell behavior.

methods.name: Versions
methods.description: Returns the version string of the service.

methods.name: Callsign
methods.description: Returns the callsign identifying the service.

methods.name: State
methods.description: Returns the current state of the service.

methods.name: Resumed
methods.description: Indicates if the service is resumed.

methods.name: IsSupported
methods.description: Checks if a feature is supported based on uint8_t parameter.

methods.name: EnableWebServer
methods.description: Enables the web server with specified parameters.

methods.name: Submit
methods.description: Submits a request with a JSON element.

methods.name: Notify
methods.description: Sends a notification with category and message.

methods.name: QueryInterfaceByCallsign
methods.description: Queries an interface by call sign.

methods.name: ProxyStubPath
methods.description: Returns the path to proxy stub.

methods.name: Activate
methods.description: Activates the service with a reason.

methods.name: Deactivate
methods.description: Deactivates the service with a reason.

methods.name: Reason
methods.description: Returns the reason for a state change.

methods.name: ConfigLine
methods.description: Sets or gets the configuration line with string parameter.
